control

Class PlaceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.PlaceController

  • public class PlaceController
extends java.lang.Object
    PlaceController controls the places of the current GraphController and contains methods to import and export Place data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlaceController()
      Create a new PlaceController with an empty list of places.
      PlaceController(AddressFinder finder, Queue queue)
      Create a new PlaceController with a custom AddressFinder and a queue.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addPlace(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address)
      Finds the coordinates for the given place and adds it to the place list.
      boolean changeHome(java.lang.String newAddress)
      Changes the home address.
      java.lang.String getHomeAddress() 
      Place[] getPlaces()
      Returns the places in an array where the index of the array corresponds to the index of the Place object.
      void importPlaces(java.lang.String file)
      Imports places from a text file, finds the coordinates for the places and adds the places to the place list.
      void savePlaces(java.lang.String file)
      Saves the current Place list into a text file.
      void useSavedPlaces(java.lang.String file)
      Imports saved Place objects from a text file

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaceController

        public PlaceController()
        Create a new PlaceController with an empty list of places.

      • PlaceController

        public PlaceController(AddressFinder finder,
                       Queue queue)
        Create a new PlaceController with a custom AddressFinder and a queue.
        Parameters:
        finder - AddressFinder object to be used with this PlaceController.
        queue - ObjectQueue can be empty or contain Place objects that will be added to the place list.

    • Method Detail

      • importPlaces

        public void importPlaces(java.lang.String file)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Imports places from a text file, finds the coordinates for the places and adds the places to the place list.
        Parameters:
        file - The name of the file containing place data. Each row in the file must describe the place in the form "Name;Address" (without the quotation marks).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while importing the data.

      • changeHome

        public boolean changeHome(java.lang.String newAddress)
        Changes the home address.
        Parameters:
        newAddress - The new home address.
        Returns:
        True if the change was successful, false otherwise.

      • savePlaces

        public void savePlaces(java.lang.String file)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves the current Place list into a text file.
        Parameters:
        file - The name of the file. Note that the file must already exist.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while saving data.

      • useSavedPlaces

        public void useSavedPlaces(java.lang.String file)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Imports saved Place objects from a text file
        Parameters:
        file - The name of the file. Each row in the file must contain a toString representation of a Place object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while importing saved data.

      • getPlaces

        public Place[] getPlaces()
        Returns the places in an array where the index of the array corresponds to the index of the Place object.
        Returns:
        An array containing the current Place objects.

      • getHomeAddress

        public java.lang.String getHomeAddress()

      • addPlace

        public boolean addPlace(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String address)
        Finds the coordinates for the given place and adds it to the place list.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the place.
        address - The address of the place.
        Returns:
        True if the addition was successful, otherwise false.
